page.title: 17Merrist Wood Farm, Guildford
page.content: Merrist Wood is an{agricultural {college}in the northernmost area of our map. It covers 196 hectares. It employs 7 permanent staff and teaches 30-150 students. It teaches how to run a farm and use farm machinery. Some students board and others just come on day courses. It grows food crops but mainly fodder.{Animals}are kept for meat and breeding. These include 180 dairy cows and 2 bulls, 150 ewes, 1000 deep litter hens, 80 sows and 5 boars. It uses modern methods and machines such as the{combine harvester}and tractors. It has more machinery than other farms to give practice to the students. Every year the farm has an open weekend when the public can wander round while work goes on. Ten year old children at Northmead Middle School visit the farm 3 times a year.
